actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 101-491.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 914.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to designate segments of the Sudbury, Assabet, and Concord Rivers as a study area for inclusion in the national wild and scenic rivers system.
short_title: Sudbury, Assabet, and Concord Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 1990

summary.text: Sudbury, Assabet, and Concord Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 1990 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate Sudbury, Assabet, and Concord River segments in Massachusetts for study for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Sudbury, Assabet, and Concord River Study Advisory Committee to advise him during the preparation of the study of such river segments. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Sudbury, Assabet, and Concord Wild and Scenic River Study Act
Sudbury, Assabet, and Concord Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 1990
A bill to designate segments of the Sudbury, Assabet, and Concord Rivers as a study area for inclusion in the national wild and scenic rivers system.
